TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit WebPartMenuStyle extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableStyle implements class System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor
Public NotInheritable Class WebPartMenuStyle Inherits TableStyle Implements ICustomTypeDescriptor
public ref class WebPartMenuStyle sealed : System::Web::UI::WebControls::TableStyle, System::ComponentModel::ICustomTypeDescriptor
type WebPartMenuStyle = class inherit TableStyle interface ICustomTypeDescriptor

summary.span: 包含 控制項上之功能表的樣式特性。

span.span: Contains style characteristics for menus on controls.

summary.span: 這個類別無法被繼承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別是基本上物件，其中包含要套用至功能表上的樣式特性控制項。The class is essentially a object, which contains style characteristics to apply to menus on controls. Web 組件控制集用法物件，以判斷上的動詞命令功能表的樣式特性控制項。The Web Parts control set uses the object to determine the style characteristics of the verbs menu on a control. 每個標題列中包含動詞命令功能表控制項，以及它包含各種使用者介面 (UI) 的動作 （稱為動詞命令），使用者可以執行，例如關閉、 最小化、 匯出或刪除控制項。A verbs menu is contained in the title bar of each control, and it includes various user interface (UI) actions (called verbs) that users can perform, such as closing, minimizing, exporting, or deleting a control. > [!IMPORTANT] > 您可以設定樣式屬性物件，並因此動詞命令功能表上的所有區域，使用中的控制項上的屬性區域。You can set style attributes on the object, and thus on the verbs menu of all the controls in a zone, by using the property on a zone. 類別有兩個重要屬性。The class has two important properties. 第一個是屬性，決定是否功能表的內容靠左、 置中，或未設定的控制項或對齊右邊。The first is the property, which determines whether the content of the menu is aligned on the left, the center, or the right of the control or the alignment is not set. 屬性會決定功能表陰影的色彩在控制項，如果使用者的系統上已啟用的遮蔽功能的功能表。The property determines the color of the shadow for the menu on a control, if the menu shadowing feature is enabled on the user's system. 類別也有一些重要的方法。The class also has some critical methods. 方法複製非空白的樣式項目從樣式物件傳遞至方法，並將其以套用物件，覆寫任何現有的樣式項目在程序。The method copies nonblank style elements from the style object passed into the method, and applies them to the object, overwriting any existing style elements in the process. 方法同樣地會複製非空白樣式項目從樣式物件傳遞給方法，但它不能覆寫現有的樣式項目中物件。The method similarly copies nonblank style elements from the style object passed to the method, but it does not overwrite existing style elements in the object. 方法會移除任何已定義的樣式項目，從物件的狀態包。The method removes any defined style elements from the object's state bag. 類別也會實作中所包含的所有方法介面。The class also implements all the methods contained in the interface. 一般情況下，這可讓類別套用至不同類型的功能表。In general, this enables the class to be applied to different types of menus.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Pages

Public Overrides Sub CopyFrom (s As Style)

span.span: A that contains style information to copy.

summary.span: 複製非空白樣式項目至 物件，並在程序中覆寫任何現有的樣式項目。

span.span: Copies nonblank style elements to the object, overwriting any existing style elements in the process.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會複製從指定的樣式資訊物件，以及是否有任何現有的樣式項目中執行個體，它會覆寫它們。The method copies style information from the specified object, and if there are any existing style elements in the instance, it overwrites them. > [!NOTE] > 這個方法會覆寫其基底方法的其中一個原因是自訂程序的指派值給屬性。One reason this method overrides its base method is to customize the process of assigning a value to the property.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Pages

Public Overrides Property HorizontalAlign As HorizontalAlign

member this.HorizontalAlign : System.Web.UI.WebControls.HorizontalAlign with get, set

summary.span: 取得值，表示 控制項功能表內容所要使用的水平對齊類型。

span.span: Gets a value indicating what type of horizontal alignment to use for the content of a menu on a control.

value.span: 列舉值，指定所要使用的對齊類型。

span.span: A enumeration value that specifies what type of alignment to use.

value.span: 預設值是取自基底 屬性值。

span.span: The default value is obtained from the base property value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會覆寫基底屬性，以防止從所設定的對齊方式，以及將某些屬性加入至屬性。The property overrides the base property to prevent the alignment from being set, and to add some attributes to the property. 屬性會取得其值來自基底屬性值，但不提供任何實作 setter，因此您無法使用這個屬性來設定功能表內容的對齊方式。The property gets its value from the base property value, but does not provide any implementation for the setter, so you cannot set the alignment of the menu content by using this property.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Pages

span.span: A that contains style information to copy.

summary.span: 複製非空白樣式項目至 執行個體，但不覆寫現有的樣式項目。

span.span: Copies nonblank style elements to the instance, but does not overwrite existing style elements.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是類似中的方法，它會從指定複製的樣式項目物件，但它不同，因為它不能覆寫任何現有的樣式項目中執行個體。The method is similar to the method in that it copies style elements from a specified object, but it differs in that it does not overwrite any existing style elements in the instance. > [!NOTE] > 這個方法會覆寫其基底方法的其中一個原因是自訂程序的指派值給屬性。One reason this method overrides its base method is to customize the process of assigning a value to the property.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Pages

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Reset() cil managed

summary.span: 將任何定義的樣式項目從 物件的狀態包中移除。

span.span: Removes any defined style elements from the object's state bag.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是在基底方法非常類似類別。The method is very similar to the base method in the class. 之後的某些自訂處理屬性，這個方法只會呼叫基底的方法，以從狀態包中移除任何剩餘的樣式項目。After some custom handling for the property, this method simply calls the base method to remove any remaining style elements from the state bag.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Pages

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Drawing::Color ShadowColor { System::Drawing::Color get(); void set(System::Drawing::Color value); };
member this.ShadowColor : System.Drawing.Color with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定值，判斷 控制項功能表的陰影色彩。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that determines the shadow color for a menu on a control.
A that determines the shadow color.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性在使用者有 Microsoft Windows 功能表遮蔽功能啟用在系統上時，才會生效。The property takes effect only when users have the Microsoft Windows menu-shadowing feature enabled on their systems. 啟用功能表的遮蔽功能時，屬性會設定 功能表內容周圍建立陰影的色彩。When menu shadowing is enabled, the property sets the color of the shadow that is created around the menu content. 如果沒有色彩的值指派給屬性時，沒有陰影會出現在功能表上，即使在系統上已啟用功能表陰影。If no color value is assigned to the property, no shadow will appear on menus, even if menu shadowing is enabled on the system.
